message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000.  What are your thoughts?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but I believe I can find it useful within my budget. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is closer to my bottom line.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $11,000 for the product.
